    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Board
    Represents a 10x10 Battleship board.
    BoardView
    Visual representation of a Battleship board.
    CellView
    Visual representation of a single cell on the Battleship board.
    Coordinate
     
    ErrorType
     
    ExceptionHandler
     
    GameController
    Main controller for the Battleship game screen.
    GameDTO
     
    GameEventListener
    Listener interface used to decouple game logic from the user interface.
    GameException
     
    MachineOpponent
    Simple AI opponent that fires shots at a target Board.
    Main
    Application entry point for the Battleship mini project.
    Serializator
    Utility class responsible for saving and loading the game state.
    Ship
    Represents a ship in the Battleship game.
    Ship.Type
    Enumeration of ship types and their corresponding sizes.
    WelcomeController
    Controller for the welcome screen.
